title: Enhancing System Design Practical Competencies: Game-Based Learning Design Utilizing Digital Badges in Social Sciences

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational digital literacy and intermediate-level academic background in social sciences
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain the impact of digital badge systems on learning motivation
Learners apply game-based learning design principles to develop two or more PBL projects in the social sciences
Learners utilize self-directed learning strategies at least 80% of the time during the digital badge acquisition process
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
